title: Copy/Pasting into Fontographer
content:
After reading all the threads about not being able to copy/paste from illustrator to font lab, i pulled out my old installer discs and installed os9, illy 9 and fontog back onto my hard drive. I firgued that would solve the problem. Well it doesnt. I have tried everything i can think of anc i still can't import from illy.   
   
what am i doing wrong???
author: hello_caleb
